title: Why Have a Pond? Reason #4 FLOOD IRRIGATION

tasks.task: Operating flood irrigation system in a food forest using pond water.
subtasks: Turn valve to initiate water flow.
Monitor water distribution to trees and plants.
Observe pond water's fertility and microorganism activity.
Assess irrigation and nutrient application to food forest.
